trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.
Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Advise` in the MSDN library.
Reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
On successful return, contains the connection cookie.
Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::EnumConnections` in the MSDN library.
On successful return, contains the newly created enumerator.
Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionInterface` in the MSDN library.
On successful return, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
Retrieves the `IConnectionPointContainer` interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionPointContainer` in the MSDN library.
On successful return, contains the connectable object's `IConnectionPointContainer` interface.
Terminates an advisory connection previously established through <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint.Advise(System.Object,System.Int32@)"></xref>.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Unadvise` in the MSDN library.
The connection cookie previously returned from <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint.Advise(System.Object,System.Int32@)"></xref>.
